statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, next_maintenance_date, service_type FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE service_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT service_description, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, service_description FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE service_type = 'oil change';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY next_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT service_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule GROUP BY service_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT service_type FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT vehicle_id, service_description FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-03-01' AND service_type IN ('tire rotation', 'brake inspection') ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT log_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description, mechanic_name FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'oil change' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON VehicleMaintenanceSchedule.vehicle_id = MaintenanceLogs.vehicle_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer FROM Vehicles;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM Breakdowns ORDER BY breakdown_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, year, last_maintenance_date FROM Vehicles WHERE year < 2010 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND mechanic = 'John Doe';
SELECT breakdown_id, breakdown_date, breakdown_description FROM Breakdowns WHERE breakdown_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicle ORDER BY make DESC;
SELECT v.make, v.model, t.task_name FROM vehicle v JOIN maintenance_task t ON v.vehicle_id = t.task_id;
SELECT l.log_id, m.maintenance_id, l.technician, m.due_date FROM maintenance_log l JOIN vehicle_maintenance m ON l.maintenance_id = m.maintenance_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year >= 2010;

SELECT make, model, year, task_name, description FROM vehicle JOIN vehicle_maintenance ON vehicle.vehicle_id = vehicle_maintenance.vehicle_id JOIN maintenance_task ON vehicle_maintenance.task_id = maintenance_task.task_id;

SELECT maintenance_log.log_id, maintenance_task.task_name, maintenance_log.technician FROM maintenance_log JOIN vehicle_maintenance ON maintenance_log.maintenance_id = vehicle_maintenance.maintenance_id JOIN maintenance_task ON vehicle_maintenance.task_id = maintenance_task.task_id;
SELECT make, model, COUNT(*) as maintenance_count FROM vehicle JOIN vehicle_maintenance ON vehicle.vehicle_id = vehicle_maintenance.vehicle_id GROUP BY make, model ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, manufacturer, purchase_date, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_type, mechanic_name, cost FROM maintenance_logs WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT center_name, location FROM service_centers WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, purchase_date FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT v.vehicle_type, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_type FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN maintenance_logs m ON v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id WHERE m.cost > 500 ORDER BY m.maintenance_date ASC;

SELECT mv.mechanic_name, mc.specialization, mc.experience_years FROM mechanics mc INNER JOIN maintenance_logs ml ON mc.mechanic_name = ml.mechanic_name INNER JOIN vehicles v ON ml.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE v.vehicle_type = 'Car' ORDER BY mc.experience_years DESC;
SELECT s.center_name, s.location, m.maintenance_type, m.cost FROM service_centers s INNER JOIN maintenance_logs m ON s.center_id = m.center_id WHERE m.maintenance_date = '2022-08-15';
